person.description: Elder Mervyn Bennion Arnold was named a member of the First Quorum of Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 4, 2009, after serving in the Second Quorum of the Seventy since April 5, 2003. He is a former president of the Costa Rica San Jos√© Mission, counselor in a stake presidency, stake high councilor, bishop, elders quorum president, and full-time missionary in the Northern Mexico Mission.
